queries: Can I get a replacement part for my product?
baseline_responses: Certainly. Can you please provide the product name, SKU, or serial number, and a description of the part you need?
original_model_responses: Can you please provide the model number of the replacement part you need?
fine-tuned_model_responses: I can help you with that. Can you please provide the model number of the product you're looking for?

queries: How do I reset my password?
baseline_responses: We can help with that. Please provide your account email, and we'll send you instructions on how to reset your password.
original_model_responses: You can reset your password by using the password recovery tool.
fine-tuned_model_responses: You can reset your password by clicking on the link in the email you received from us.

queries: How do I update my payment information?
baseline_responses: We can help with that. Can you please provide your account email so we can guide you through updating your payment information?
original_model_responses: I'm sorry, we don't accept credit cards.
fine-tuned_model_responses: You can update your payment information by clicking on the "Payment" tab and selecting "Update payment information."

queries: Can I place a custom order?
baseline_responses: We'd be happy to assist you. Can you please provide the product name or SKU and a description of the customizations you'd like?
original_model_responses: Can you please provide the product name, model number, and the order number?
fine-tuned_model_responses: Can you please provide your order number and the details of the custom order?

queries: How do I schedule a consultation or appointment?
baseline_responses: We'd be happy to help. Can you please provide your name, phone number, and the service you're interested in so we can schedule your appointment?
original_model_responses: You can do this by clicking the button "Sign up" on the top right of the page.
fine-tuned_model_responses: You can schedule an appointment by calling the number listed on the website.

baseline_responses: Certainly. Can you please provide the product name or SKU and your email address so we can notify you when pre-orders are available?
original_model_responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you please provide the name of the item you're interested in?
fine-tuned_model_responses: Can you please provide your order number and the item you're looking for?

queries: I can't find the item I'm looking for.
baseline_responses: We're here to help. Can you please provide a description or product name of the item you're looking for so we can assist you?
original_model_responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you please provide your email address and we can look up the item for you?
fine-tuned_model_responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you please provide your order number and the item you're looking for?

queries: What is the status of my warranty claim?
baseline_responses: We'd be happy to check for you. Can you please provide your claim number or the product's serial number?
original_model_responses: Is there anything I can do to help you?
fine-tuned_model_responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you please provide your warranty number and the date of purchase?

queries: I want to change my shipping address.
baseline_responses: No problem. Can you please provide your order number and the new shipping address you'd like to use?
original_model_responses: I'm sorry to have to wait. Can you please provide me with your email address so I can send you the shipping address?
fine-tuned_model_responses: I can help you with that. Can you please provide your shipping address so I can check the status?

queries: I have a question about my bill.
baseline_responses: We'd be happy to help. Can you please provide your account number and a brief description of your question?
original_model_responses: I'm sorry, I can't help you right now. Can you please provide your account number and your question so I can help you out?
fine-tuned_model_responses: I can help you with that. Can you please provide your account number and the date of your bill?

baseline_responses: We do offer free shipping on select orders. Can you please provide the product name or SKU and your shipping destination so we can check if your order qualifies?
original_model_responses: Yes, we offer free shipping on all orders over $50.
fine-tuned_model_responses: Yes, we offer free shipping on all orders.

queries: I'm having trouble applying a promo code.
baseline_responses: We apologize for the inconvenience. Can you please provide the promo code you're trying to use, and we'll help you resolve the issue?
original_model_responses: You can use promo codes for online purchases.
fine-tuned_model_responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you please provide your promo code in the message?

queries: How do I sign up for your rewards program?
baseline_responses: Thank you for your interest in our rewards program. Can you please provide your email address so we can send you information on how to sign up?
original_model_responses: You can sign up for the rewards program by visiting the website.
fine-tuned_model_responses: You can sign up for rewards by visiting the rewards website.

queries: Is there a mobile app for your store?
baseline_responses: Yes, we do have a mobile app. Can you please provide your email address so we can send you a link to download the app and instructions on how to use it?
original_model_responses: You are a chatbot which generates automated responses to customer queries.
fine-tuned_model_responses: I can help you with that. Can you please provide your mobile number so I can check the app store?

queries: Can I place an order for in-store pickup?
baseline_responses: Certainly. Can you please provide the product name or SKU and the store location where you'd like to pick up your order?
original_model_responses: Can you please provide the order number and the store you would like to pick up the order from?
fine-tuned_model_responses: I can help you with that. Can you please provide your zip code?
